div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 24 Pyrgos environs, Elis, 1944 Burial: 450-425 B.C. (T) Contents: 48+ AR Elis: st. (through Seltman's Ser. VIII) Disposition: New York, some ex Berry Details on types in ANS Although the reports specify two separate hds., it seems possible that this is a second section of Kyparissia 1940, no. 23 above
